metadata.description: Professional development tools and plugins by Narcoleptic Fox

plugins.name: shadcn-aesthetic
plugins.description: Modern CSS/SCSS architecture based on shadcn/ui design principles for refined, accessible styling

plugins.name: blazor-development
plugins.description: Blazor component lifecycle patterns, SignalR real-time integration, state management

plugins.name: rust-embedded-systems
plugins.description: Rust Embedded Systems - Patterns for embedded development, no_std, hardware interfacing, and performance optimization

plugins.name: ux-decision-frameworks
plugins.description: Comprehensive UI/UX decision frameworks based on Nielsen Norman Group, Baymard Institute, Material Design, and Apple HIG research - Interactive tools for overlay selection, navigation patterns, accessibility validation, form design, and mobile-first development

plugins.name: saas-architecture
plugins.description: Multi-tenant SaaS patterns, isolation models, feature flags, billing integration, observability, authentication strategies, and scaling patterns

plugins.name: crisp-architecture
plugins.description: CRISP Architecture Suite - Clean, Reusable, Isolated, Simple, Pragmatic scaffolding patterns for modern applications

plugins.name: dotnet-enterprise
plugins.description: Enterprise .NET Patterns - ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework, security best practices for .NET 8, 9, and 10

plugins.name: rust-performance
plugins.description: Rust Performance Toolkit - Best practices, async patterns, zero-cost abstractions, and performance optimization

plugins.name: cross-stack-microservices
plugins.description: Cross-Stack Microservices - Production-ready templates and patterns for Go, .NET, and Rust microservices

plugins.name: modern-frontend
plugins.description: Modern Frontend - Vue 3 Composition API, React hooks, TypeScript patterns, and state management

plugins.name: defense-security
plugins.description: Defense-Grade Security - NIST compliance, security controls, cryptography, and secure development practices

plugins.name: novelcrafter-export
plugins.description: Novelcrafter Export - Tools for exporting, formatting, and converting Novelcrafter content to various publication formats

plugins.name: react-best-practices
plugins.description: React Best Practices - Modern hooks patterns, performance optimization, testing, and production-ready React development

plugins.name: go-best-practices
plugins.description: Go Best Practices - Idiomatic Go patterns, concurrency, error handling, testing, and production-ready Go development

plugins.name: vue-best-practices
plugins.description: Vue.js Best Practices - Vue 3 Composition API, reactivity system, composables, Pinia, and production-ready Vue development

plugins.name: testing-qa-suite
plugins.description: Comprehensive testing and quality assurance patterns across languages and frameworks

plugins.name: database-design
plugins.description: Database design, optimization, and query performance patterns for SQL and NoSQL databases

plugins.name: devops-iac
plugins.description: DevOps patterns and Infrastructure as Code with Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD

plugins.name: api-design-patterns
plugins.description: API design patterns for REST, GraphQL, gRPC with versioning, security, and best practices

plugins.name: mobile-development
plugins.description: Mobile development patterns for React Native and Flutter with offline-first architecture

plugins.name: ai-ml-integration
plugins.description: AI/ML integration patterns with LangChain, RAG, vector databases, and prompt engineering

plugins.name: accessibility-design
plugins.description: Accessibility and inclusive design patterns following WCAG 2.2 and ARIA best practices

plugins.name: code-quality-refactoring
plugins.description: Code quality improvement and refactoring patterns with SOLID principles and clean code practices

plugins.name: development-skills
plugins.description: Reusable skills for code review, ADRs, API documentation, test generation, and performance profiling

plugins.name: mcp-integrations
plugins.description: Integration guides and setup for MCP servers (Database, Vector DB, Cloud Providers, Docker/K8s, GitHub)
